div.p: In February 2018 come to Miami, Florida and escape the cold to learn more about PHP and speak with other developers, like you, to see what others are doing. The SunshinePHP 2018 speaker list has been announced, and we've assembled a great line-up with the most current PHP related topics for you.

Come celebrate our 6th year from February 8th to 10th, 2018 in sunny Miami, Florida. There will be a full tutorial day featuring 3-hour sessions followed by 2 days of 1-hour talks and inspirational keynotes.
